snippet.title: XANNIBAN - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
GAMEPLAY TRAILER & GAME PAGE COMING Q2 2023

Enter XANNIBAN, an original point & click survival horror game from the creator of Tealerland.

Become the ‘Trespasser’ and dash room-to-room as you lure aggressive machines into containment - using only the help of your flare-gun and various other tools. Dodge, parry, and counter adaptive AI to survive as you delve further beneath...

Coming soon to Steam! Follow me on Gamejolt & Twitter for more news on the game: https://gamejolt.com/@NeeTroo
https://twitter.com/neetrooo
